exceptions.exn: Applied theorem does not have enough premises.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a : Term A n p, q, s : list (Term A n) H : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a H0 : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM q Q H1 : CombLinear Q p H2 : eqP A eqA n s (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a q) p) IHCombLinear : forall q : list (Term A n), CombLinear Q q -> CombLinear Q (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p q) Unable to unify "CombLinear ?M2218 p" with "list (Term A n)".

original: intros Q p H. induction H. - apply CombLinear_0. - apply CombLinear_1 with (a:=a) (p:=p) (q:=q) (s:=s); auto.
